name: Ultra Sonic (HC-SR04)
description: Non-contact distance measurement sensor using sonar; range 2cm-400cm.

name: Temperature & Humidity Sensor (DHT11)
description: Basic digital sensor for measuring temperature (0-50°C) and humidity (20-90% RH).

name: PIR Motion Sensor (HC-SR501)
description: Passive Infrared sensor to detect motion of humans or animals; adjustable sensitivity.

name: LDR (Light Dependent Resistor)
description: Photoresistor whose resistance decreases with increasing light intensity.

name: Accelerometer Gyroscope (MPU-6050)
description: 6-DoF IMU combining a 3-axis accelerometer and 3-axis gyroscope for orientation sensing.

name: IR Proximity Sensor (Sharp GP2Y0A21YK0F)
description: Analog IR distance sensor using triangulation for 10-80cm range; non-linear output.

name: Magnetometer (HMC5883L/QMC5883L)
description: 3-axis digital compass for measuring magnetic fields to determine absolute heading.

name: Barometer (BMP180)
description: Digital sensor for measuring absolute barometric pressure and temperature; used for altimetry.

name: IR Sensor Module
description: Digital IR proximity sensor for short-range (2-30cm) object detection and line following.

name: Pressure Sensor (MPX5700AP)
description: High-precision industrial absolute pressure sensor with analog output (15-700 kPa).

name: GPS Module (NEO-6M)
description: Complete GPS receiver module for acquiring satellite-based location data (lat, lon, alt).

name: Heart Rate Sensor (MAX30100)
description: Integrated pulse oximetry and heart rate sensor using PPG for wearable health monitoring.

name: Blood Pressure Sensor Module
description: Complete oscillometric system with cuff, pump, and sensor for non-invasive blood pressure measurement.

name: Capacitive Touch Sensor (TTP223B Module)
description: Capacitive touch sensor module that acts as a digital replacement for a mechanical button.

name: Sound Detection Sensor (LM393 Module)
description: Detects sound levels exceeding a set threshold and provides a digital output signal.

name: Gas Sensor (MQ-2)
description: Semiconductor sensor for detecting combustible gases like LPG, propane, and smoke.

name: Image Sensor (OV7670 Module)
description: VGA (640x480) resolution CMOS camera module for capturing images and video.

name: Colour Sensor (TCS3200)
description: Converts light color to frequency, allowing a microcontroller to measure RGB color values.

name: Smoke/Air Quality Sensor (MQ-135)
description: General air quality sensor sensitive to Benzene, smoke, NH3, NOx, and other gases.

name: Soil Moisture Sensor (Resistive)
description: Measures soil moisture by sensing electrical resistance between two probes; prone to corrosion.

name: Vibration Sensor (SW-420 Module)
description: Digital shock and vibration detection module using a normally closed switch.

name: Tilt Sensor Switch Module
description: Simple digital switch that detects inclination using an internal rolling ball mechanism.

name: Load Cell (5kg)
description: Strain gauge transducer for measuring weight up to 5kg; requires an HX711 amplifier.

name: Force Sensing Resistor (FSR 402)
description: Resistor that changes its value based on applied force; used for pressure-sensitive interfaces.

name: Soil Moisture Sensor (Capacitive)
description: Measures soil moisture via changes in capacitance; corrosion-resistant for long-term use.

name: Hall Effect Sensor (A3144 Module)
description: Digital switch that activates in the presence of a magnetic field.

name: Biometric Fingerprint Sensor (R307)
description: Optical fingerprint reader module with onboard storage for up to 1000 fingerprints.

name: Facial Recognition Module (ESP32-CAM)
description: Integrated ESP32 microcontroller and camera for WiFi video streaming and face recognition.

name: Oxygen Sensor (Electrochemical)
description: Measures atmospheric oxygen concentration (0-25% Vol) using an electrochemical cell.

name: Carbon Dioxide Sensor (NDIR)
description: High-accuracy Non-Dispersive Infrared (NDIR) sensor for measuring CO2 concentration.

name: Radiation Sensor (Geiger Counter Module)
description: Detects ionizing radiation (alpha, beta, gamma) using a Geiger-Müller tube.

name: Flame Sensor Module
description: Detects flames by sensing infrared radiation in the 760-1100 nm wavelength range.

name: Magnetic Field Sensor
description: 3-axis digital compass for measuring magnetic fields to determine absolute heading.

name: Ambient Light Sensor (BH1750)
description: Digital I2C sensor that measures ambient light intensity directly in lux.

name: Soil Moisture Sensor (Capacitive)
description: Measures soil moisture via changes in capacitance; corrosion-resistant for long-term use.

name: Gesture Sensor (APDS-9960)
description: Multi-function I2C sensor for gesture, proximity, ambient light, and RGB color sensing.

name: Lidar Sensor (TF-Luna)
description: Time-of-Flight (ToF) LiDAR sensor for fast and accurate distance measurement up to 8m.

name: Arduino Uno
description: Popular ATmega328P-based microcontroller board with 14 digital I/O pins and 6 analog inputs.

name: Arduino Nano
description: Compact Arduino board based on ATmega328P; breadboard-friendly with mini-USB.

name: ESP32
description: Powerful WiFi & Bluetooth enabled microcontroller with dual-core processor and rich peripherals.

name: ESP8266
description: WiFi-enabled development board based on ESP8266 with built-in USB and Lua firmware support.

name: Raspberry Pi Pico
description: Low-cost microcontroller board with RP2040 chip, dual-core ARM Cortex M0+ processor.

name: STM32 Blue Pill
description: ARM Cortex-M3 development board with 72MHz clock, 64KB flash, ideal for advanced projects.

name: 16x2 LCD Display
description: Character LCD with 16 columns x 2 rows, blue backlight, parallel interface, 5V.

name: 0.96" OLED Display
description: Small OLED display with I2C interface, high contrast, wide viewing angle, 128x64 resolution.

name: 1.3" OLED Display
description: Larger OLED display with SPI interface, white or blue color, 128x64 resolution, 3.3-5V compatible.

name: Nokia 5110 LCD
description: Monochrome graphic LCD with 84x48 resolution, SPI interface, low power consumption.

name: TFT 1.8" Color Display
description: Small color TFT display with 128x160 resolution, SPI interface, ST7735 driver.

name: TFT 2.4" Touchscreen
description: Color TFT display with resistive touch, 240x320 resolution, SPI interface, ILI9341 driver.

name: 5V Power Adapter
description: AC to DC power adapter with micro-USB connector, 5V 2A output, ideal for Arduino and Raspberry Pi.

name: 9V Battery
description: Standard 9V alkaline battery for low-power electronics and sensors.

name: 18650 Battery
description: Rechargeable lithium-ion battery, 3.7V, 2200-3500mAh capacity, ideal for portable projects.

name: 18650 Battery Holder (Single)
description: Battery holder for single 18650 cell with wire leads and protective circuit.

name: 18650 Battery Holder (Double)
description: Battery holder for two 18650 cells in series (7.4V) with wire leads.

name: 18650 Battery Holder (Triple)
description: Battery holder for three 18650 cells in series (11.1V) with wire leads.

name: USB Cable
description: USB Type-A to Micro-USB cable for Arduino and other microcontroller boards, 1 meter length.

name: Breadboard 400 Points
description: Half-size solderless breadboard with 400 tie points for prototyping circuits.

name: Breadboard 830 Points
description: Full-size solderless breadboard with 830 tie points and power rails.

name: Jumper Wires (Pack)
description: Assorted male-to-male jumper wires for breadboard connections, 65 pieces, various lengths.

name: LED Pack (10pcs)
description: Assorted 5mm LEDs in various colors (red, green, blue, yellow, white), 10 pieces.

name: Resistor Kit
description: Assorted resistor kit with common values from 10Ω to 1MΩ, 1/4W, 600 pieces.

name: Push Button (5pcs)
description: Tactile push button switches, 6x6mm, 4-pin, momentary, 5 pieces.

name: Relay Module
description: Single channel 5V relay module with optocoupler, control high-voltage AC/DC loads up to 10A.

name: Motor Driver L298N
description: Dual H-bridge motor driver module, control 2 DC motors or 1 stepper, 5-35V, 2A per channel.

name: DC Motor (Standard)
description: Small DC motor for hobby projects, 3-6V operating voltage, 16500 RPM.

name: Geared DC Motor
description: DC motor with gearbox for higher torque and lower speed, 6V, 200 RPM.

name: 9g Servo Motor
description: Micro servo motor with 180° rotation, 4.8-6V operating voltage, torque 1.8kg/cm.

name: Tower Pro SG90 Servo
description: Popular micro servo motor with 180° rotation, 4.8-6V, torque 2.5kg/cm.

name: MG996R Servo (Metal Gear)
description: High-torque metal gear servo motor, 10kg/cm torque, 180° rotation, 4.8-7.2V.

name: Mini Water Pump
description: Submersible DC water pump for aquariums and plant watering systems, 3-6V, 120L/H flow rate.

name: Submersible Water Pump
description: Larger submersible water pump for fountains and irrigation, 12V, 240L/H flow rate.

name: Stepper Motor (28BYJ-48)
description: 5V stepper motor with ULN2003 driver board, 4096 steps per revolution, low noise.
